scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('üîç Verificando variables de entorno...'); const env = import.meta.env || {}; const required = ['VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY', 'VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN', 'VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID']; const missing = required.filter(key => !env[key]); if (missing.length > 0) { console.log('‚ùå Faltan variables:', missing); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('‚úÖ Todas las variables est√°n configuradas'); }"
